slimeglob.str_event_start: You mined an extra big glob of slime! <:slime1:431564830541873182>

slimefrenzy.str_event_start: You hit a dense vein of slime! Double slimegain for the next 30 seconds.
slimefrenzy.str_event_end: The double slime vein dried up.

poudrinfrenzy.str_event_start: You hit a dense vein of poudrins! Guaranteed poudrin on every !mine for the next 5 seconds.

minecollapse.str_event_start:
The mineshaft starts collapsing around you.
Get out of there quickly! ({cmd} {captcha})

voidhole.str_event_start: You hit a sudden gap in the stone, with a scary looking drop. You see what looks like a trampoline on a building's roof at the bottom. Do you **!jump** in?

shambaquarium.str_event_start: Holy. Fucking. SHIT. You spot some brainz. Grab 'em all with **{}** {} before they get washed away by the current!
shambaquarium.str_event_end: The brainz drift away into the endless expanse of the Slime Sea. Cringe.
